notes:
This dataset provides numbers of suspected cholera cases, deaths, case fatality rates (%) and attack rates (per 1,000) by Governorate in the Yemen cholera outbreak since 27 April 2017. 

The data are manually extracted from the Yemen cholera outbreak epidemiology updates produced by WHO Yemen. The updates are posted on the [Yemen Situation Reports page](http://www.emro.who.int/yem/yemeninfocus/situation-reports.html) on the WHO Regional Office for the Eastern Mediterranean site.  This dataset contains data from the daily updates up the [daily report published on 8 November 2017.](http://www.emro.who.int/images/stories/yemen/Yemen_Cholera_Response_-_Daily_Epidemiological_Update_-_2017-11-08.pdf?ua=1)
